column4: Hello, my screen resolution is not what i should be, ive tryed to change it but it gets eaven weirder. the panels messup and i get strange artifacts and stuff like that. The only resolution that works is the standard one but it still isnt right. I have a widescreen laptop
do you guys see what im writing?
if i answer no would that be a yes?
sudo apt-get install build-essential
I have it already
would you try to build it ?
than your prolly trying to compile it with wrong gcc
the compile works with dpkg-buildpackage
ive never used that way to build anything i normally use the tar
apt-build is like emerge
i know what apt-build is i just only used it once
I use it on powerpc right now, but had the same error on amd64 or i386. don't know what's wrong
the error is  checking for C compiler default output file name... configure: error: C compiler cannot create executables
i would try gcc-3.4
the build goes fine with dpkg-buildpackage on the same source
dpkg has nothing to do with gcc
ok bu dpkg-buildpackage succes where apt-build fails, so I am wondering
checking for C compiler default output file name... configure: error: C compiler cannot create executables  still the same error
i still think its a gcc3.4 issue install gcc-3.4 and thanuse the export command so ubuntu uses 3.4 than try again
I need some help about export command. however some people use it fine with gcc4 on another chanel
exportCC=3.4 i think is the command
runes I am on powerpc, but I will try on a K7 box also
runes, I pasted the config.log here http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/14623 . I tried to export gcc3.4 but it fail the same way. there is a lot of unkwnown things in the log. I don't know what it means
ok, the processor is unkown ...
